name: be you
description: HELLO i made weird game visual novel thingy Your character develops different personality types depending on your choices, so they respond uniquely to different situations. With around three different choices to make and three unique lines of dialogue for each of them there's around nine different texts you can see and six endings.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 64bit Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 500MB Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any modern soundcard
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
